tp.pr5.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleController, GUIController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller is the front-end to work with the controller of the app.
    Through this we can abstract us from the concrete implementation controller.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected RobotEngine engine 
      protected java.util.Vector<RobotEngineObserver> engineObservers 
      protected java.util.Vector<InventoryObserver> inventoryObservers 
      protected java.util.Vector<NavigationObserver> navigatorObservers 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Controller(RobotEngine model)
      Common memory reservation for controller instances.
      This has to be overridden by their inherited classes in order to reserve memory for particular components of different controllers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected boolean processInstruction(java.lang.String input)
      Process String parameter trying to convert it to one Instruction object and tells to the engine game to perform it.
      It request to the model show an error if the instruction syntax is bad formulated.
      void registerEngineObserver(RobotEngineObserver robotEngineObserver)
      For registering robot engine observers to the controller and the robot engine of walle
      void registerItemContainerObserver(InventoryObserver itemContainerObserver)
      For registering inventory observers to the controller and the inventory of walle
      void registerNavigationObserver(NavigationObserver navigationObserver)
      For registering navigation observers to the controller and the navigation module of walle
      void requestQuit()
      Request end the application from the view.
      By default it calls to engine.requestQuit().
      abstract void startController()
      Associate the model to the controller (RobotEngine), register observers, make configurations and startup the game.
      It must be Override depends on the type of interface chosen by the user.
      It's absolutely essential that this method call to engine.requestStart()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        protected Controller(RobotEngine model)
        Common memory reservation for controller instances.
        This has to be overridden by their inherited classes in order to reserve memory for particular components of different controllers.
        Parameters:
        model - the main class of the model to associate this controller to it.

    • Method Detail

      • startController

        public abstract void startController()
        Associate the model to the controller (RobotEngine), register observers, make configurations and startup the game.
        It must be Override depends on the type of interface chosen by the user.
        It's absolutely essential that this method call to engine.requestStart()

      • registerEngineObserver

        public void registerEngineObserver(RobotEngineObserver robotEngineObserver)
        For registering robot engine observers to the controller and the robot engine of walle
        Parameters:
        robotEngineObserver - observer to register

      • registerItemContainerObserver

        public void registerItemContainerObserver(InventoryObserver itemContainerObserver)
        For registering inventory observers to the controller and the inventory of walle
        Parameters:
        itemContainerObserver - observer to register

      • registerNavigationObserver

        public void registerNavigationObserver(NavigationObserver navigationObserver)
        For registering navigation observers to the controller and the navigation module of walle
        Parameters:
        navigationObserver - observer to register

      • processInstruction

        protected boolean processInstruction(java.lang.String input)
        Process String parameter trying to convert it to one Instruction object and tells to the engine game to perform it.
        It request to the model show an error if the instruction syntax is bad formulated.
        Parameters:
        input - String which claims be an instruction.
        Returns:
        true if the processing was well.

      • requestQuit

        public void requestQuit()
        Request end the application from the view.
        By default it calls to engine.requestQuit(). If one concrete implementation must closed or shut down anything else of the app, its controller have to override this method (but it can call to it with super)
